name: diametric
content:
Add to word list

If two people or ideas are diametric opposites, they are as different as possible. : diametric opposite When it comes to managing money, the couple are diametric opposites. The whole appeal of the film is the diametric contrast between the two main characters.
More examplesFewer examplesHer performance is the diametric opposite of what you might expect.She testified in court in diametric opposition to what she had said to her lawyer the previous day.Journalists readily adopted the idea of "heroes" and "zeroes", further encouraging such diametric comparisons.
